# Uma Musume Drafting System - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
React + Vite + TypeScript + Tailwind CSS project for an Uma Musume Pretty Derby drafting system.

## Draft System Rules
- Two teams alternate picking and banning
- Character Draft: Each team picks 6 uma musume, then bans 1 (total: 10 picked, 2 banned)
- Map Draft: Each team picks 4 maps, then bans 1 (total: 6 picked, 2 banned)
- Flow: Picks happen first in back-and-forth manner, then bans at the end

## Technology Stack
- React 18
- Vite
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS

## Development Commands
- `npm run dev` - Start development server
- `npm run build` - Build for production
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build
